title: COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, Large Drying Space with 6.48ft², 600W Dehydrated Dryer, 6 Stainless Steel Trays, 48H Timer, 165°F Temperature Control, for Herbs, Meat, Fruit, and Yogurt, Silver
descriptions:
Meet the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky—the powerful, easy-to-use dehydrating powerhouse designed in California to help you make healthier, tastier snacks at home. With a generous 6.48 ft² of drying space across six stainless steel trays (12 x 13 in each), you can dry more in one batch—perfect for beef jerky, fruit chips, herbs, veggies, yogurt, and pet treats.

Performance you can taste:
- 600W of even, efficient drying with rear-mounted hot air circulation for consistent results on every tray.
- Precise digital control from 95°–165°F and a 30-minute to 48-hour timer, so you can fine-tune every recipe—low and slow for herbs, higher heat for jerky.
- Quiet operation under 48 dB, ideal for overnight drying.

Built for convenience:
- Six premium stainless steel trays are durable, food-safe, and dishwasher safe for easy cleanup.
- Clear glass door and bright touch-control LED display make monitoring effortless.
- Memory function recalls your last settings for quick repeat batches.
- Includes a mesh screen for small items and a fruit roll sheet for leathers and yogurt.

Safe and reliable:
- Auto shutoff and overheat protection for peace of mind.
- 120V, 60 Hz—made for USA and Canada.

Get inspired with 50 chef-crafted recipes and enjoy snacks that are natural, flavorful, and free from additives while extending your food’s shelf life. From weekend jerky to weekday lunchbox fruit, the COSORI Food Dehydrator makes it simple to create better-for-you bites at home, batch after batch.
